article.headline: Bryant knocks off Binghamton 77-69
article.description: — Sherif Kenney's 24 points helped Bryant defeat Binghamton 77-69 on Thursday night.

images.name: Binghamton Bearcats vs. Bryant Bulldogs: Full Highlights

video.title: Binghamton Bearcats vs. Bryant Bulldogs: Full Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Binghamton Bearcats vs. Bryant Bulldogs: Full Highlights) 2024/01/12 ESHEET

article.story: SMITHFIELD, R.I. -- — Sherif Kenney's 24 points helped Bryant defeat Binghamton 77-69 on Thursday night. Kenney shot 6 for 15 (1 for 5 from 3-point range) and 11 of 15 from the free throw line for the Bulldogs (10-7, 2-0 America East Conference). Earl Timberlake scored 18 points and added nine rebounds. Daniel Rivera had 12 points and was 6 of 10 shooting and 0 of 3 from the free throw line. Nehemiah Benson led the Bearcats (8-6, 0-1) in scoring, finishing with 21 points and eight rebounds. Binghamton also got 16 points, nine rebounds and three blocks from Tymu Chenery. Armon Harried also had 10 points and eight rebounds. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
